website_summaries.verdict: A sturdy, multi-floor cleaning unit with a reliable mopping feature.
pros: Owners praise the versatility of this model, as it's a mop and vacuum in one
Gets long battery life and has sturdy construction
Works with Alexa and Google Assistant so you can control it by voice
cons: Some mapping and software issues noted
Customer service could be more attentive

customer_reviews.title: Wanted to Love it
customer_reviews.text: Arrived Saturday and have been vacuuming since then. This morning, the robot lost the boys bedroom icon designation and the bathroom icon designation, and would not let me re-assign without a whole house map redo. Then, it refused to clean room #2, after asking the robot to clean areas #1 & #2. Then it failed to find the docking station. After placing two calls to tech support, I've got nothing. One tech support guy told me to reboot my phone. Extremely disappointed. Terrible tech support. I'm not going to spend $600 and get a confused robot and then no one that can help me through the issue. Going back...Very disappointed in the company.
customer_reviews.author: jen

customer_reviews.title: Can I get my money back?
customer_reviews.text: This worked well for about 1 week. I reset the map because it hadn't registered an entire bedroom in its initial map. Now it cant figure out where to go. Never finds its recharge location, and I end up finding the robot in random pla es of my house. This thing is a big expensive joke. Works just as well as the roomba I bough back in 2008. Actually the roomba probably worked better. I attached just a couple of pictures of what the vac has completed when it alerts that it's done with its job and it's ready to find its charger... then it doesnt.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Robles

customer_reviews.title: Like it so far, very intelligent
customer_reviews.text: I have used this Deebot 950 three times in our 3-floor townhouse, we love it so far. The suction power is impressive, it can even clean our long-hair rug after removing the brushes. The mopping mode is useful, just you’d better completely wet the cloth before attaching to Deebot, otherwise it would take a while before it can mop evenly. The AI part is also great, the app allows you to customize your cleaning area, the feature I like most is to leave the area not for mopping.
customer_reviews.author: Frank He

customer_reviews.title: Good Specs with Bad  navigation !
customer_reviews.text: For the price and features this would be the best robot in the market,the only and the major downfall is the navigation,here's and example Day 1: Map the floor and save it (enable/disable multi-floor) and assign rooms (for selective cleaning) Day 2: select rooms for cleaning Day 3 : select rooms for cleaning and you see map has changed form the original run BUMMER !! expectation is saved map layout should not change,due to this we would have remap the whole floor again and start from the beginning Unfortunately returning it ,would keep if it persistent map is not an requirement !
customer_reviews.author: Don86

customer_reviews.title: Works Well
customer_reviews.text: I love my Deebot and have convinced my mom and grandma to get one. I did have trouble mapping my house at first, and occasionally it seems to "forget" my map if I don't run it often enough. I also, at times, have trouble getting it to register the dust bin. However, this is a nice little robot that helps me not have to vacuum my house as often.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Deebot Ozmo 950 Best Robot Vacuum Ever
customer_reviews.text: It took me literally 5 minutes to setup the Ecovacs App and after fully charged, it took 1.5 hours to perfectly vacuum the whole house. As you can see from the attached map it covered 95% of our 150 square meters bottom floor. Never seen anything like this.
customer_reviews.author: TA

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great vacuuming and mopping robot, especially for families with cats, it can save you a lot of time to clean the cat hair. It is very easy to use! It has WiFi for App control, which is very convenient. You can use the App to schedule cleaning time. The installation of the App is also very easy. The battery can work for up to 3 hours, which is great! I am very satisfied with this purchase and will recommend. By the way, my cat loves this robot!
customer_reviews.author: Gjt

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t Work Right Out of Box - Returned
customer_reviews.text: Mine didn’t work, right out of the box it only ran in small circles so I returned it and was unable to use all of the features. I was really disappointed because I had done so much research and decided this was the best value for what I wanted a robot vacuum to be capable of. Will be looking at other brands now.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah L

customer_reviews.title: Way better than iRobot. Amazing mapping technology and unbelievable suction.
customer_reviews.text: Wow wow wow! What an amazing robot vacuum. We have hardwood and carpet on our main floor and this thing keeps the floor clean. I love the mapping function and the app. It’s fairly easy to setup. The laser mapping works great! The only negative I would have is the dust bin is fairly small. We have a golden retriever and we have to clean the bin almost daily. Other than that it performs so much better than our roomba does.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Amazing vacuum
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum works so great!!! It maps everything out and goes in and out of everything. My floor is spotless after. And i have two dogs that shed. Not one hair is left on the floor. So happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Litlefish

customer_reviews.title: Great vac!
customer_reviews.text: Does an amazing job getting close to everything and making sure everything is clean rather than random crazy patterns that don't get everything. Can see the maps and send it to rooms or specific small areas. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: TRK

customer_reviews.title: These Replacement Mop Pads DO NOT fit the Deebot T8 AIVI.
customer_reviews.text: The description for this product is wrong and needs to be changed. It clearly states the T8 AIVI in the description. The box says for the 920 / 950, nothing about the T8. This is the second order I have had to return because it doesn't fir the Deebot T8 AIVI mop section correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Holcomb

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: We run it every other day and have reduced our “normal” vacuuming to once per month. We have a couple of toddlers and it’s great to be able to schedule the vacuum to run after lunch time and during naps to pick up all of lunch’s crumbs. We do not have any pets and most of our flooring is hard wood. The bedrooms are carpet, and it still does a good job. The mapping function is nice for maintenance but not comparable to hand mopping or steam cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: INCORRECT DESCRIPTION - NOT for T8
customer_reviews.text: Despite listing description that "...for Models OZMO 920, 950, T5, T8 AIVI", these definitely do not fit the T8 AIVI. Inspecting the back of the box shows OZMO 700/750/920/950 only. There's no mention of the T5 or T8. Unfortunately I only read the box after opening the packaging and seeing how poorly the pad fit. Don't make my mistake
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: useful
customer_reviews.text: Overall, this robot is so amazing!!! It has two functions: vacumming and mopping, which means it not only cleans up the trash on the floor, but also cleans up the dirt. It significantly decreases my workload, I feel so cozy recently! By the way, the quality of this robot is good. Also, the height of this robot is very small, so it definitely can do under bed clean work.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly smart, not good at mopping heavy dirt
customer_reviews.text: This device is very smart - it maps an efficient route through the house, finds its way home and can be programmed to avoid areas or go to specific rooms. The downside - it holds very little water and uses very little water, and it can't clean heavy stuck-on dirt.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: So far excellent product
customer_reviews.text: A month with the robot and no complaints, excellent product. I live with my two children under 12, imagine that. We tested the white socks around the house, and really clean and mop enough that you don't stain the white socks in a day of walking after you've cleaned the entire house. It is not for deep cleaning but only for daily maintenance or every two or three days. I Will write again in two month.
customer_reviews.author: Alejandro

customer_reviews.title: Best Ever
customer_reviews.text: First time using robot vacuum. Pleasantly impressed with the suction power. Although i'd think a force/pressure sensing mop would be even better, the hybrid suction/mop feature is doing cleaning wonder to my kitchen every day. A must-have time saver!
customer_reviews.author: T. To

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again when needed
customer_reviews.text: Nice having backup mopping pads. These ones are a little bigger then the one it came with but gets the job done. Fits loosely in the back but sticks like normal so it holds on like normal.
customer_reviews.author: Krystal Knobloch

customer_reviews.title: Very Good
customer_reviews.text: This product has good quality and strong overall function. It has the cleaning function of ordinary products and the cleaning function of mopping that other products don't have. It can also record the cleaning route intelligently and arrange the cleaning route reasonably. This product is easy to operate and convenient to use. It is a good helper for you to clean your home.
customer_reviews.author: Jackson aaron

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money!!
customer_reviews.text: This was definitely not worth my money. It kept messing up, never returning to the charging dock. Would always claim it was full and needing to be emptied but was not full. It did not pick up like it was supposed to and it missed a lot of places too even after have you arts fixed on it. I’m definitely happy Amazon was able to go ve me my refund.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Does not match original mopping pad.
customer_reviews.text: These are the approved Deebot replacement mopping pads but do not match the thickness of the pad that shipped with the vacuum. Not sure why maybe it is old stock? I can't find any other options, even on the Ecovacs website.
customer_reviews.author: TechNTools

customer_reviews.title: It keeps going and going
customer_reviews.text: Great mapping, lots of suction and very long battery life, 2 - 3 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Look Mom no hands
customer_reviews.text: Love that my home stay so clean with very little effort. Wish it could 1. Mop and vac vacuum floors in one cleaning cycle automatically. 2. Docking station that would vacuum debris reservoir automatically for at least a month.
customer_reviews.author: Baine

customer_reviews.title: Great improvement in sound over previous series
customer_reviews.text: Great improvement over the 920. Quiet, I can talk over it or watch TV while it is running. Better suction power and much better battery life. I can now carry it to other floors to clean the house without worrying about the battery.
customer_reviews.author: RedWolf

customer_reviews.title: Great investment
customer_reviews.text: Worthwile investment, especially if you have a busy life and want to enjoy your time off work rather than spend hours cleaning
customer_reviews.author: cpand20

customer_reviews.title: Amazing bot
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for and this bot was worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: BenchTT

customer_reviews.title: If you want quality- this is your robot!
customer_reviews.text: I just returned a competitors product and purchased the Deebot; I couldn’t be happier. I am in love with the technology of this machine and it’s mapping ability. It mapped my home on the first run and never missed a spot. Additionally, the battery life is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: First vacuum impressed...
customer_reviews.text: Let the robot clean my house for the first time, very impressed. Did a good job. Would recommend this product. I picked up light small carpets off the floor before the robot got to work. I also made sure no shoes, socks etc. lying around on floor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Malfunctions with sensors in new machine
customer_reviews.text: There is a sensor malfunction , that doesn't go away ! The machine is fairly new and for the price I would not recommend purchasing this robotic vacuum ...
customer_reviews.author: bagelman

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit the T8 AIVI
customer_reviews.text: Product title states that it fits the DEEBOT T8 AIVI however, it does not have the proper dimensions for this model. For the models it is made for, this appears to be genuine and of good quality
customer_reviews.author: Hadessa

customer_reviews.title: 5 star! Must have!
customer_reviews.text: Best robot vaccum ever! Makes having 3 dogs much easier!
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Excelent devised
customer_reviews.text: Excelent product it works and clean better than previous models. It automatically recognizes carpets implementing suction power. We have a shiba inu dog and pick ups the hair with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I think this was one of the Best Buy’s I have done..
customer_reviews.author: Nanismo

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bot!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! Specially for the price when compared to other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Rafael Feliciano

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! All promises in the videos comparing with other brands and models were confirmed!
customer_reviews.author: Raphael Souza

customer_reviews.title: This robot performs very well
customer_reviews.text: We really like this robot vacuum it seems a lot better than the shark robot we were using
customer_reviews.author: Tom Berry

customer_reviews.title: Game Changer
customer_reviews.text: Works great on floors and carpet. Mopping is nice too. App is usually good, but is buggy at times.
customer_reviews.author: Justin S.

customer_reviews.title: The order of its cleaning.
customer_reviews.text: This robot cleans very well. it is worth my money.
customer_reviews.author: Dotbaby

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Learned my house on first pass, then it will repeat route without hitting anything.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy L Henry

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Cleans amazing, it replaced a ROMBA and does a much better job
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Dixon

customer_reviews.title: Other than map issues this is a fantastic vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I would LOVE this vacuum if I didn't have to remap my house every few weeks. It's very frustrating. But when the technology works well it's an amazing vacuum. I was told that maybe I different router would help with losing my maps but I shouldn't have to do that.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph Mason Clark

customer_reviews.title: Great Vacuum, Mop Not so much
customer_reviews.text: Update- First thing, turn on advanced mode in the app, to allow it to save and use your map. Vacuum works great. Tracking works great overall, some minor glitches. But overall I’m very happy with the vacuum. The mop I do not believe it releases enough water to wet the pad properly which cause it to leave streaks. It also does not say at a constant speed, so the faster it goes, the more streaks it leaves. In my opinion, the mop is more of a gimmick. I’m waiting for a good mop that is made just for mopping. If you can’t do it right, don’t try.
customer_reviews.author: James Laurie

customer_reviews.title: Significant software issues
customer_reviews.text: There are significant problem with software and AI algorithm. I been trying to get map drawn for my house and constantly having issues. First it dies in middle of first cleaning cycle and next time it came back to charging when battery started going low but never resume cycle after charged. I had to put on low power to map my first floor. Even after than required resetting vacuum to get map loaded in app to save. When I moved to second floor it merge both maps as you can see in pictures. I don’t think this vacuum worth investment.
customer_reviews.author: surbhi jain

customer_reviews.title: It great!
customer_reviews.text: Vacuume works very well and it’s a hoot to watch it while vacuuming or mopping. Easy to use software app but does need a few improvement. The only problem I’ve found is when you first try to connect it to your WiFi router. What a pain. After talking to customer service for an hour (yes they actually answered the phone) I finally got it connected. If you have a dual frequency router like I do, you have to shut off the 5ghz In order to connect with 2.4ghz after connected then you can turn back on the 5ghz. Weird. All I all, I really like this DeeBot. Time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: GunSmoke

customer_reviews.title: Good but the AI needs some further development
customer_reviews.text: I named it Debster. She cleans well enough but can't complete my 2000 square foot condo in one battery charge. Debster does some very strange routing. If I tell it go to back to the charging station, it will take the most curious circuitous route going around in circles before finally settling in. She bumps into things rather than using her camera to avoid objects. Other than that, she works and picks up a lot of dust and dirt. I'm not sold on the mopping feature. The streaks would suggest an uneven mopping.
customer_reviews.author: rdscapitolhill

customer_reviews.title: Was not what I was hoping for.
customer_reviews.text: Has a tendency to get into places where it gets wedged in and can't get out or it high centers itself and gets hung up on transitions between flooring types. Mopping is a 1 star rating...takes a long time and not very effective.
customer_reviews.author: PJS

customer_reviews.title: Works So far
customer_reviews.text: This is an upgrade from a dumb sweeper. I don't miss the constant wall thumps of the previous one... Mapped out the house in about 55 min. Love the resume cleaning feature.
customer_reviews.author: CodeMonkey

customer_reviews.title: Great Technology! Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: She is a beast, love the app and you Can see everywhere that she has cleaned. She feels up everything I have three dogs and she picks up tons of hair. I would recommend if you have pets and don’t like the vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Scott E Phillips

customer_reviews.title: It's terriffic
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Deebot. One for upstairs and one for down. This on is primarily on hardwood and tile floors with a couple of throw rugs. It cleans and mops and does a wonderful job.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent little helper
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this vacuum cleaner. It cleans and mops and does its job perfectly. Sometimes wish the mop would push a little harder on the floor for better cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Iske

customer_reviews.title: Great Robot work great
customer_reviews.text: I don’t like mopping feature. But robot work great. Only thing I would change is that own could name all room in his house. Not room 1 or room 2 but studio or study or kitchen or even Larry’s room. Then from my point of view this robot would be perfect
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best gift for my bestie.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this robot for my bestie as her housewarming gift. She loves it soooooo much and she posted to her ins to show it off. Yes it's expesensive but it deserves the price. It can figure out the house map right after being uesd for a couple times. I dont know how well it works but I can tell from my bestie it's really satisfying.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: clean dirt box every 3-5min
customer_reviews.text: waste money on this junk,,i have to clean out the dirt box every 3-5 min or about 100sqf,, dirt stuck half before it getting full....
customer_reviews.author: Andy Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Good helper!
customer_reviews.text: Easy install, good apps, a great helper for releasing my hands! Help me with daily clean! Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Ling Ge

product_meta.title: ECOVACS DEEBOT OZMO 950 2-in-1 Robot Vacuum Cleaner & Mop with Smart Navi 3.0 Technology, Up to 3 Hours of Runtime, Multi-Floor Mapping, 3 Levels of Suction Power, Hard Floors & Carpets, and Pet Hair
product_meta.description: Style:DEEBOT OZMO 950Robotic Vacuum with Smart Navigation 3.0, OZMO Mopping, Up to 200 Min Runtime, and 3 Levels of Suction Power.
feature_bullets: Ozmo mopping: DEEBOT can simultaneously vacuum and mop to remove up to 99.26% of bacteria on floors (study by Hygiene and Microbiology Research Center). The Ecovacs Home app enables you to adjust the water level of the mopping. With carpet detection, DEEBOT automatically avoids carpets when it mops.

Smart Navi 3.0: Smart Navi 3.0 enables DEEBOT to efficiently navigate your home and map your floorplan to your smartphone using laser technology. The interactive map gives you the ability to choose how and where you want to clean. Utilize unlimited virtual boundaries, area mode, and custom mode to clean specific areas/rooms or to avoid others.
Over 3 hours of run time: A longer battery life for large homes.
3 levels of suction power: Utilize 3 levels of suction power (Normal, Max, and Max Plus) to tackle any mess.

Multi-floor mapping: DEEBOT can now create up to 3 different maps perfect for multi-level homes and multiple cleaning spaces; When DEEBOT starts to clean, it will automatically recognize the saved area it is going to clean

Voice & app controls: Alexa & Google Assistant voice commands. Ecovacs Smart App comes w/ 5+ advanced features including direct control, scheduling, status updates, cleaning modes, accessories status, etc.
Standard: 1-year. Comes w/ (1) charging dock, (4) side brushes, (2) high efficiency air filter, (2) mopping pads, (1) cleaning tool, customer support

Multi-floor mapping: DEEBOT can now create Upto 3 different maps perfect for multi-level homes and multiple cleaning spaces; When DEEBOT starts to clean, it will automatically recognize the saved area it is going to clean

Voice & app controls: Alexa & Google Assistant voice commands. Ecovacs Smart App comes w/ 5+ advanced features including direct control, scheduling, status updates, cleaning modes, accessories status, etc.
Standard: 1-Year. Comes w/ (1) charging dock, (4) side brushes, (2) high efficiency air filter, (2) mopping pads, (1) cleaning tool, customer support

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars233 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
specifications.Included Components: Main Brush, Filter, Dustin, Side Brushes, Robot
